metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18511 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-origin images can be read from a canvas element in violation of thesame-origin policy using the transferFromImageBitmap method. *Note: Thisonly affects Firefox 65. Previous versions are unaffected.*. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 65.0.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18511` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 65.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 65.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 65.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 65.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '65.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
